RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 84. Claiming Purse 19000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $20,000. Louisiana Bred Claiming Price $25,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DRIFTER broke back, lacked speed off the inside, tipped out five wide turning for home seeking room, finished willingly down the middle of the strip to be edging away at the end. LULOS bothered to be off a step slow, moved up to press the issue through the turn, vied four wide through the bend, continued to do battle past the furlong marker, could not match strides late with the winner, prevailed for the place. EUROBELIEVER broke outward to bother the runner up, raced behind the lead pack, continued in traffic late turn, slipped through a narrow opening along the inside entering the stretch, finished clear of the rest while outkicked for the runner up spot. B W P SPIRIT away in good order, narrowly set the pace along the inside, got out a bit to allow EUROBELIEVER the inside into the stretch, weakened. ORDER UP dueled early in the two path, continued to contest the issue up front through the turn between horses, faltered in the drive. BARAHIN in the second flight early, advanced and challenged up front three wide and between foes early in the turn, gave way soon after, trailed home. HALF MILE FRACTIONAL SPLIT HAND TIMED DUE TO BIRD INTERFERENCE.

ENTRY.NAME: B W P Spirit
ENTRY.OWNER: Norman, Mark and Norman Stables LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied up front inside, got out bit late turn, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Drifter
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, lacked speed outside, tipped out 5w 1/4, willingly

ENTRY.NAME: Eurobeliever
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out, off pace, traffic late turn, slipped thru rail,clr 3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Lulos
ENTRY.COMMENT: bothered, off slow, used, vied 4w turn, prevailed 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Barahin
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight early, bid turn 3w and btwn foes, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Order Up
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled early outside, between foes turn, faltered drive

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 2 5F Turf CR: 60. Maiden Claiming Purse 21000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $20,000, For Each $2,500 To $15,000 2 lbs. (Rail at 20 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BUCK DOLL TAYLOR broke alertly, set the pace off the inside, allowed CHECKULATER the rail into the lane, came in slightly to exchange a brush with that foe past the furlong marker, came in more significantly under a right handed crop to soundly bump that same foe late. CHECKULATER forwardly placed along the inside, crept closer into the lane, lodged a rail bid past the furlong marker brushing with BUCK DOLL TAYLOR, soundly bumped by that foe late, well clear of the others. COCAL reluctant to load, broke in good order, prompted the pace pace while three wide into and through the turn, had little for the top pair to the wire, narrowly saved the show. FRIEND'S DO CARE went one paced along the inside in the second flight, not enough for the show. GONE SOLUTION off a step slow, raced in mid pack off the inside, steered out past the furlong marker, finished up evenly in also lacking a closing punch. TRUE CRIMSON in the second flight outside, four wide late in the turn, lacked a closing kick as well. APRIORITY AVENGER five wide into the turn when off the pace, four wide exiting, remained back. MINE YOUR BIZ four wide into the turn, tired. HAPPY SEASON bothered early in some traffic, tried to get out midway up the backstraight, bolted early in the turn, jogged in on the outside rail. FOLLOWING A CLAIM OF FOUL BY THE RIDER OF CHECKULATER AGAINST BUCK DOLL TAYLOR FOR INTERFERENCE IN DEEP STRETCH AND A STEWARDS' INQUIRY, THE LATTER WAS DISQUALIFIED FROM FIRST AND PLACED SECOND.

ENTRY.NAME: Checkulater
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed inside, rail bid,brush, sound bump late

ENTRY.NAME: Friend's Do Care
ENTRY.COMMENT: one paced inside, not enough show

ENTRY.NAME: Happy Season
ENTRY.COMMENT: bothered early, tired to get out, bolted turn, outside rail

ENTRY.NAME: dq-Buck Doll Taylor
ENTRY.OWNER: Autumn Hill Farms Racing Stables, Inc.
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke alertly, pace off rail, brush 1/8,came in, bumped foe late

ENTRY.NAME: Gone Solution
ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slow,mid pack, steered out 1/8, evenly late

ENTRY.NAME: Cocal
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted pace 3w, no match top two, narrowly held show

ENTRY.NAME: True Crimson
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight outside, 4w turn, no kick

ENTRY.NAME: Mine Your Biz
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4w into turn, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Apriority Avenger
ENTRY.COMMENT: five wide into the turn, 4w exiting, remained back

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 76. Claiming Purse 11500. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE MAY 26, 2022. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 26, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MISTS OF TIME close from the start while racing outside, challenged three wide in the turn, kicked well clear through the stretch under steady handlng. HEARTTHROB HALO in the second flight while also out in the strip, had nothing for the winner through the lane while clearly second best. WHENTHEDOVESCRY off a step slow, trailed early, came four wide for the drive, along for the show with a mild rally, no threat to the top two. TRAELEE one paced while four wide. GENIUS vied early off the inside, continued to do battle while between horses and inside the winner turn, faltered in the drive. MINISTER'S MEDAL broke on top, narrowly set the pace for a half along the inside then caved when headed by the winner. BLUSHINSTREETDEVIL backed up outside, well back at the end.

ENTRY.NAME: Whenthedovescry
ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slow, trailed early, 4w into the lane, along for show

ENTRY.NAME: Minister's Medal
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke on top, with the pace inside, caved after half

ENTRY.NAME: Genius
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied early off rail, vied btwn foes turn, faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Mists of Time
ENTRY.COMMENT: close from start outside, 3w bid turn, kicked clear stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Heartthrob Halo
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight outside, no match, clearly 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Traelee
ENTRY.COMMENT: one paced four wide

ENTRY.NAME: Blushinstreetdevil
ENTRY.OWNER: Sharp Cynthia A and Richards Corale A
ENTRY.COMMENT: backed up outside, well back

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 4 5F Turf CR: 87. Claiming Purse 19000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES IN 2023. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $20,000 (Claiming Races For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight And Eligibility). Louisiana Bred Claiming Price $25,000. (R ail at 20 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TOUGH CHARLIE closest to the leader into the turn, asked along late in the bend, lodged an inside rally a furlong out, steadily drew out while kept to pressure. SPECTROLITE broke on top, quickly clear, set a lively set of fractions while maintaining daylight through the turn, challenged from the inside by the winner past the furlong marker, proved no match for that one, comfortably held the place. WILD BERT settled outside and in the main body, continued out in the course into the lane, getting to the runner up late while not a threat to the winner. TACTICAL PRIORITY in the second flight just off the inside, continued in the two path for the drive, went evenly to the wire in lacking a closing response. BINDING AGREEMENT last to leave, raced back and was never dangerous. GRAND PRADO raced well back off the pace, failed to produce a rally. CHIMNEY ROCK trailed while racing four wide.

ENTRY.NAME: Tough Charlie
ENTRY.COMMENT: closest to leader, asked along turn, inside bid, drew clear

ENTRY.NAME: Spectrolite
ENTRY.COMMENT: quickly clear, lively splits, no match final 1/8, held 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Grand Prado
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced back off the pace, failed to rally

ENTRY.NAME: Binding Agreement
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, raced back, never dangerous

ENTRY.NAME: Tactical Priority
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight off the inside, evenly drive

ENTRY.NAME: Chimney Rock
ENTRY.OWNER: Brandon Theodore Clear Creek Stud LLC and Ducoing Sturges J
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, four wide into lane

ENTRY.NAME: Wild Bert
ENTRY.COMMENT: off the pace outside, getting to runner up late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 67. Claiming Purse 13000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WAITIN' ON A WOMAN in a bit tight at the start, closer into the turn when four wide, took over into the lane, quickly clear, ridden out late. HALF A BUCK in mid pack while off the inside, four wide through most of the turn, asked midway on the bend, rallied to be clear for the place, no match for the winner. BRYKEN N MITCHELL back off the pace outside, five wide through the turn, improved to be closest to the winner in upper stretch, had little more for that one, could not contain the runner up while remaining clear of the others. CIGAR VAN within striking distance early, raced three wide and inside the winner in the second flight into the turn, bit closer with that one by late in the bend, lacked further advance through the stretch. SIR POKERFACE void of speed while in some traffic into the turn, four wide exiting the bend, improved position without posing a serious threat. JOEY'S LIGHTENING broke back, lacked speed, improved position, no real threat. NOCOMET last to leave, moved up to race in mid pack toward the inside through the turn, had little left for the drive. SHOT ON WINDY HILL remained back in failing to menace. CLASSIC RED RACER vied up front off the inside, disposed of the other speed before a half, gave way in the drive. MONITOR MILLS broke through the gate and ran off for two furlongs, broke well, flashed early foot along the inside, backed up. THIRTYEIGHTCALIBER fell back after the start, was always outrun while wide.

ENTRY.NAME: Cigar Van
ENTRY.OWNER: Pitzer Renee and Berggren Wayne J
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance, 2nd flight 3w turn, evenly drive

ENTRY.NAME: Joey's Lightening
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, lacked speed, improved,no real threat

ENTRY.NAME: Monitor Mills
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke thru gate, ran off, flashed speed, backed up

ENTRY.NAME: Nocomet
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, moved up, raced in some traffic turn, little left late

ENTRY.NAME: Shot On Windy Hill
ENTRY.COMMENT: remained back in failing to menace

ENTRY.NAME: Half a Buck
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack 3-4w, asked turn, rallied 2nd, no match

ENTRY.NAME: Classic Red Racer
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied early off the inside, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Waitin' On a Woman
ENTRY.COMMENT: bit tight start, stalked 4w, took over, clear, ridden out

ENTRY.NAME: Bryken N Mitchell
ENTRY.COMMENT: back off the pace outside, 5w turn, finished best rest

ENTRY.NAME: Sir Pokerface
ENTRY.COMMENT: traffic into turn, 4w exiting, improved position

ENTRY.NAME: Thirtyeightcaliber
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell back after start, showed little while wide

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 6 1M Dirt CR: 63. Claiming Purse 15000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MEAN AMERICAN within striking distance off the inside, shifted out a bit turning for home, challenged soon after outside the leader, lugged in to bother that one slightly a furlong out, continued to try to lug in a bit while edging clear at the wire. EAGLEOVERTHEMOON four wide when forwardly placed into the first turn, pressed the issue up the backstretch, took over far turn, showed the way into the lane, responded when the winner challenged, bothered slightly by that one a furlong out, gave ground grudgingly to the winner to the wire. US SECOND CUTE PIE in mid pack for five furlongs, roused in the second turn, two path into the lane when beginning a mild rally, up for the show while no match for the top two. THE GREY BEAUTY broke on top, set the pace for a half, briefly dueled with the winner in the far turn, began to weaken when headed by that one, caught late for the show. FLASHYBOY'S LILSIS lacked speed for five furlongs, improved position without posing a serious threat. MYLIES STAR settled off the pace and the inside, lacked response in the drive. MSCHITCHATTOUR last away, remained back in failing to threaten. KAITLYN'S COURT was finished after a half, trailed in. FINAL WAS HAND TIMED DUE TO TIMER MALFUNCTION.

ENTRY.NAME: Flashyboy's Lilsis
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed, improved, no real threat

ENTRY.NAME: Us Second Cute Pie
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, roused 2nd turn, mild rally 2p, no match top two

ENTRY.NAME: The Grey Beauty
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke on top, pace, briefly dueled, weakened when headed

ENTRY.NAME: Mean American
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance, outside bid, lugged 1/8,edged clear

ENTRY.NAME: Kaitlyn's Court
ENTRY.COMMENT: finished after half, trailed in

ENTRY.NAME: Mschitchattour
ENTRY.COMMENT: last to leave, remained back

ENTRY.NAME: Mylies Star
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled off the pace, lacked response drive

ENTRY.NAME: Eagleoverthemoon
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4w into 1st turn, pressed, took over 2nd, slight bother 1/8

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 7 5F Turf CR: 75. Claiming Purse 19000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $20,000, For Each $2,500 To $15,000 2 lbs. (Rail at 20 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FIREINTHESTORM broke sharp, narrowly showed the way up the backstretch, continued to hold a small advantage while saving ground through the turn, shrugged off the other speed entering the stretch, remained clear until late, enough left to withstand a late run from the runner up. OLE STUD MUFFIN back off the pace out in the course, five wide into the lane when beginning to rally, finished with good energy down the middle of the course to be rapidly getting to the winner in the waning strides. HARD CANDY squeezed back at the break, void of speed while three wide and between foes turn, still well back into the stretch, late run to finish up well and gain the nod for the show. WIN WON DOBBS with the pace while three wide into the turn, continued to vie, fell back off the winner entering the stretch, lightly bumped with BORDEAUX RED just inside the furlong grounds, nipped at the wire for the show. BORDEAUX RED pressed the issue between foes, could not keep up with the winner upper stretch, lightly bumped with WIN WON DOBBS midstretch, weakened. MEET KEVIN settled in mid pack, went one paced throughout. LITTLE PUCK brushed at the start, made little other impact,. HEY JACKSON raced in the second flight early while outside, tired. COLT'S BRIM had nothing for the drive. ST JOE last to leave, was always outrun while racing five wide out of the turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Little Puck
ENTRY.COMMENT: brushed start, little impact

ENTRY.NAME: Hard Candy
ENTRY.COMMENT: squeezed break, raced back, 3w turn, stride late, willingly

ENTRY.NAME: Meet Kevin
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, lacked closing bid

ENTRY.NAME: Colt's Brim
ENTRY.COMMENT: had nothing for the drive

ENTRY.NAME: Fireinthestorm
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke alertly,pace inside, shook clear, enough left

ENTRY.NAME: St Joe
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, always outrun while five wide

ENTRY.NAME: Bordeaux Red
ENTRY.OWNER: Brehm Erich G Barrows Matthew Fox James W Hovitz Charles P Michaels Lee and Mitc
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed btwn foes, light bump 1/8, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Win Won Dobbs
ENTRY.COMMENT: with the pace three wide, light bump 1/8, nipped show

ENTRY.NAME: Ole Stud Muffin
ENTRY.COMMENT: back off the pace outside, 5w into lane, willingly, coming late

ENTRY.NAME: Hey Jackson
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight outside, tired

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 8 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 76. Allowance Purse 36000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 26, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. (Maiden And Claiming Races Not Considered In Allowa nces).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LOVELYREDSTILETTOS broke out, was straightened to move up and contest the issue through a rapid opening quarter, shook off the other speed to be well clear through the turn, maintained a clear advantage through the lane under firm handling in a solid effort. CAJUN GUMBOW broke alertly, showed the way early, dueled with the winner late backstretch inside that one, fell back off that one through the turn, set down for the drive, coming again late. THAT'S MY MAMA chased the dueling leaders early, continued that pursuit into the stretch, some gain late while holding sway for the show. A RUNNIN AFLEET last to leave, lacked early foot, improved position slightly. APRIORITY MAGIC in mid pack, had little for the drive. AGAMI fell back to trail after the start, failed to menace.

ENTRY.NAME: Cajun Gumbow
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke alertly, quick duel early, fell back, coming again

ENTRY.NAME: That's My Mama
ENTRY.OWNER: Angelle Glenn M and Tamporello Glenn A
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased duel early, some interest late

ENTRY.NAME: Apriority Magic
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, had little for the drive

ENTRY.NAME: Agami
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell back, trailed, no menace

ENTRY.NAME: A Runnin Afleet
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, lacked speed, improved slightly

ENTRY.NAME: Lovelyredstilettos
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out,used bit, quick duel, shook clear, maintained

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 9 7F Dirt CR: 49. Maiden Claiming Purse 14000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HONEST ANGUS in the second flight outside up the backstretch, moved closer four wide into the turn, bid, dueled late turn, still four wide into the lane to lose ground to the other leader, came back to reengage that one inside the furlong grounds, held the runner up safe late. SAINT MARY fractious post parade, cut off at the start, lacked speed for over a half, advanced off the inside into the stretch, steadily getting to the winner late. HIGHER NOTE broke out, chased the early leader up the backstretch, took over early in the turn, dueled with the winner outside that one late in the bend, shook free of that one when straightened for home, weakened the final furlong to lose the advantage then was caught in the final strides for the place. KASENS TRIBE broke back, void of any early speed,improved position while racing outside. SILK NOT SATIN forwardly placed early, steady fade. MS. PRIESTLY behind the pace inside, moved out, failed to rally. BON CHANCE BET took command to show the way out of the chute, set the pace up the backstretch, stopped in the far turn, finished far back. TOUCHING ACES within striking distance up the backstretch, moved a bit closer in the turn, lost action midway on the bend, gradually pulled up, walked in.

ENTRY.NAME: Ms. Priestly
ENTRY.COMMENT: off the pace inside, moved out, failed to rally

ENTRY.NAME: Silk Not Satin
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed early, steady fade

ENTRY.NAME: Touching Aces
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance, lost action turn, pulled up, walked

ENTRY.NAME: Kasens Tribe
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, void of speed, improved outside

ENTRY.NAME: Honest Angus
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight outside,closer4w into turn,lost ground, came back,held

ENTRY.NAME: Higher Note
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out, chased, took over turn, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: Saint Mary
ENTRY.OWNER: Clear Creek Stud LLC and Roven John
ENTRY.COMMENT: cut off start, lacked speed, rallied, closing gap

ENTRY.NAME: Bon Chance Bet
ENTRY.COMMENT: took command out of the chute, pace, stopped far turn
